trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_restriction" name="restriction" href=""></xref> element for simple content from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
This class can be used to derive simple types by restriction.
Such derivations can be used to restrict the range of values for the element to a subset of the values specified in the inherited simple type.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleContentRestriction"></xref> class.
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnyAttribute"></xref> to be used for the attribute value.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref> and <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttributeGroupRef"></xref> collection of attributes for the simple type.
The collection of attributes for a simple type.
Gets or sets the simple type base value.
The base value must be a QName.
Gets or sets the name of the built-in data type or simple type from which this type is derived.
The name of the base type.
Gets or sets an Xml Schema facet.

One of the following facet classes: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxLengthFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaPatternFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaEnumerationFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxInclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMaxExclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinInclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaMinExclusiveFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaFractionDigitsFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaTotalDigitsFacet"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaWhiteSpaceFacet"></xref>.
